title: SILKYPIX Developer Studio v3.0.16.1 (The Joker)
description:
SILKYPIX Developer Studio 3.0" can generate beautiful pictures from the RAW data taken by a digital camera. "SILKYPIX Developer Studio 3.0" creates the highest-definition picture which cannot be obtained by taking JPEG or TIFF pictures.Using SILKYPIX Developer Studio 3.0, you have complete control to multiple functions to adjustment the color, tone, and white balance ultimately creating the highest resolution picture taken by a digital camera.

Features :

These are features of"SILKYPIX Developer Studio 3.0".
